1: <pb/><t>Al d'a eb' etchon̈ab' icha tic: Schon̈ab' Dios caji, xajan on̈ yuuj, xa chi, xchi Jehová.</t>
2: <t>Ix yalan Jehová d'ayin to svac'och in b'a ch'oxnab'iloc yed' eb' vuninal yed' pax ix snun eb', yuj chi' ix valan icha tic d'a eb' unin chi': A ix e nun chi' man̈xo vetb'eyumoc ix, man̈xo in yetb'eyumoc pax ix, palta alec d'a ix to maxtzac yac'och sb'a ix ajmulal, yactejocab'can eb' vin̈ sc'uman ix chi'.</t>
3: <t>Tato an̈eja' sc'ulan ix icha chi', ol vac' q'uixvelal ix, ol viq'uel spichul ix, ol can b'eran ix icha yic ix alji. Ichaval taquin̈ lum ol ajcan ix vuuj, ol champax ix yuj taquin̈tial.</t>
4: <t>Man̈ ol oc'paxlaj in c'ol d'ayex, yujto yune' ex ix d'a yajmulal.</t>
5: <t>A ix e nun chi', ix och ix ajmulal. Ix ixtaxel svach'ilal ix ayic ix yalan ix icha tic: Ol b'at in say mach nib'ab'il vuuj, mach tz'ac'an in vael yed' tas svuq'uej, mach tz'ac'an in lana yed' in lino, in perfume yed' in vino, xchi ix.</t>
6: <t>Yuj chi' ichato ol in mac sb'e ix d'a te' q'uiix, ol vac'anoch macte' d'a spatictac, yuj chi' man̈xo ol ilchaj sb'e ix b'aj ol b'atoc.</t>
7: <t>Ol b'at tzac'an ix d'a spatic mach snib'ej chi', palta man̈ ol yamchaj yuj ix. Ol sayec' ix, palta man̈xo ol ilchaj yuj ix. Yuj chi' ol yalan ix icha tic: Ol in meltzaj d'a vin̈ vic'nac d'a sb'ab'elal. Vach'taxon vaj yed' vin̈ d'a yichan̈ icha ticnaic, xcham ix, xin chi d'a eb'.</t>
8: <t>Yuj tas sc'ulej eb' vetisraelal chi', yuj chi' ix yal Jehová icha tic: Maj yojtaquejel eb' tato a in svac' strigo eb', svino eb' yed' sperfume eb' to a in svac' nivanb'oc q'uen plata yed' q'uen oro d'a eb', axo d'a juntzan̈ comon dios ix yac' eb'.</t>
9: <t>Yuj chi' ol viq'uec' ixim in trigo yed' in vino, ol vic'anpaxec' noc' in lana yed' in lino tz'och spichuloc eb'.</t>
10: <t>Q'uelanoch juntzan̈ chon̈ab' ix montanb'at yic syal sb'a eb' d'a scomon diosal, ol vac'an q'uixvoc eb'. Man̈xa mach ol colanel eb' d'a yol in c'ab'.</t>
11: <t>Ol vac' lajvoc stzalajc'olal eb' yuj q'uin̈ yic tz'alji q'uen uj yed' d'a sc'ual ic'oj ip yed' masanil juntzan̈xo q'uin̈ tz'ochtaxoni.</t>
12: <t>A eb' israel ix alani: A juntzan̈ comon dios ix ac'an sat te' uva yed' te' higo stojoloc b'aj ix caq'uem co b'a, xchi eb'. Yuj chi' a in Jehová in ol in satel juntzan̈ te' uva yed' te' higo chi'. A b'aj avab'il chi' ol vac'och vayumtaquil, axo noc' caltacte'al noc' ol ab'lanb'at avb'en chi'.</t>
13: <t>A in Jehová in svala' to ol vac'och yaelal d'a yib'an̈ eb', yujto nivan tiempo ix yaltej incienso eb' d'a juntzan̈ yechel Baal. Ix laj sb'oan sb'a eb' icha junoc ix ix syac'och yuchiquin yed' ston̈ tz'och tzac'an yuj eb' vin̈ nib'ab'il yuuj, syac'an sat sc'ool d'a vin̈ yetb'eyum. Icha chi' in yutej chon̈ab' Israel tic.</t>
14: <t>Vach'chom icha chi' ix sc'ulej chon̈ab' Israel tic, palta ol in montej, ol vic'anxib'at d'a tz'inan luum. Ata' ol val vach' lolonel d'ay.</t>
15: <t>Ol vac'anxi sluum b'aj avab'il yuva. A sch'olanil ilc'olal ol vac'och sch'olanil yipc'olal. Icha yaj d'a sb'ab'elal ayic yelnaccot d'a Egipto icha chi' ol vutocxicani. Ata' ol tac'voc d'ayin, ichaval sc'ulej junoc ix cob'es ix.</t>
16: <t>A in Jehová in svala' to a d'a jun c'ual chi', ol in yal yetb'eyumoc. Man̈xo ol yal jun chon̈ab' tic to Baal vaj d'ay.</t>
17: <t>Juneln̈ej ol viq'uel d'a sti' yac'an b'inaj juntzan̈ Baal, man̈xa b'aq'uin̈ ol yac' b'inajoc.</t>
18: <t>A d'a jun c'ual chi', ol vac' in trato yed' noc' caltacte'al noc', noc' much yed' noc' chan, yic man̈xalaj tas ol utaj yuj noc'. D'a juneln̈ej ol vic'canel q'uen lanza d'a jun chon̈ab' tic yed' juntzan̈xo yamc'ab' yic oval, yic vach' ol yic' yip in chon̈ab' tic, man̈xa tas ol sna'a.</t>
19: <t>Ach chon̈ab' Israel, ichato ol ach vic' d'a juneln̈ej. Toton val icha vetb'eyum ol ach aj d'a stojolal yed' d'a smojalil, yujto ol oc' val och in c'ol d'ayach yed' ach in xajanani.</t>
20: <t>Ichato ol ach vic'a', ol in c'ulejn̈ej tas ix vala', ichato chi' ol in ojtacaneli to Jehová in.</t>
21: <t>A in Jehová in svala': A d'a jun c'ual chi', ol in tac'voc d'ayach, ol val d'a satchaan̈, axo satchaan̈ chi' ol ac'ancot n̈ab' d'a sat luum.</t>
22: <t>Ol yac'an ixim trigo lum luum, vino yed' aceite. Ichaval chi' ol aj in pacan slesal in chon̈ab' b'ob'il vuuj.</t>
23: <t>Ol vac'xi cajnaj in chon̈ab' d'a sat lum luum tic yic tz'och ved'oc. Ol oc' in c'ool d'a ix “Man̈-xajanab'iloc” yed' d'a vin̈aj “Man̈-in-chon̈ab'oc”, ol valan icha tic: In chon̈ab' ach, xin chama. Axo ol alan d'ayin: In Diosal ach, xchama, xchi Jehová.</t>
